name: Rush Bomb
description:
Oh no! It appears that your country will be bombed in 48 hours! Someone has to disable the missile base. Can you with your hacking skills save millions of people from horrible death?!

Rush Bomb, the text-based game about a long journey through the dangerous security system of the missile base, experiencing hacking, fighting, and exploring.

This game is based on our game from Ludum Dare 46 game jam, RushBomb. We hope to expand and improve the game into a finished state.

As we work hard on this game, we'll be able to upload Devlogs here every Tuesday so we can show you the progress we did for the week.

Currently, there is a demo of the game with 4 levels, this is only a concept demo and it will be very improved in the future, but now it has some bugs.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD.
  • Attack with L
  • The HP counter will appear in the lower-left corner (when an enemy attacks you).
  • In the main menu, type in the number of the option you want and press Enter
  • Press ESC to close the game.

Known bugs:

  • At the third level, sometimes one of the lines that open the doors won’t disappear, just restart the game, having fewer things opened at the same time helps.
  • Sometimes when you exit the game it will congratulate you for finishing it.
  • When you finish the last level the game will exit automatically, it doesn’t crash.
